summary: We examined how VA handles complaints about the quality of care at VA nursing homes, called community living centers. Residents can lodge complaints with staff or patient advocates at associated VA medical centers. We found, among other things, that: Most complaints are likely not documented VA has not clearly specified which complaints should be elevated to leadership Staff didn't always follow policy, such as in...
title: Community Living Centers: VA Needs to Strengthen Its Approach for Addressing Resident Complaints
